means: 同宗的，同根的，同语系的

sentence.Network_en: Physics and astronomy are cognate sciences.
sentence.Network_cn: 物理学与天文学是互有关联的科学.

sentence.Network_en: Mathematics and astronomy are cognate sciences.
sentence.Network_cn: 数学和天文学是互相关联的科学.

sentence.Network_en: English, Dutch and German are cognate languages.
sentence.Network_cn: 英语 、 荷兰语、德语是同语族的语言.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 同源词（cognate）也称同源字，在语言学里指拥有同一个词源的词汇。这可以指一个语言里的不同的词，比如英语的“shirt”（衬衫） …
C ... coesite 柯石英 cognate 同源的 cognate inclusion 同源包裹体.
自然语言处理和计算机相关术语 -... ... code conversion 代码变换 cognate 同源（的； 词） Cognitive Linguistics 认知语言学.
coformycin 助间型霉素cognate 同源的，相关的，相应的cognate amino acid 关联氨基酸[例如由一种氨酰tRNA合成酶识别的氨基酸称为该酶的.

list.abs: cogitative 有思考力的cognate language 同族语言Cognition 认知
英语语法术语_百度文库 ... 复合宾语 complex object 同源宾语 cognate object 补语 complement.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin cognatus, from co- 'together with' + natus 'born'

entry.def: Cognate things are related to each other.

means.word_mean: 1. one related by blood or origin; especially on sharing an ancestor with another
2. a word is cognate with another if both derive from the same word in an ancestral language

auth_sentence.content: This frees the cognate mind to choose potential results.
auth_sentence.res_content: This frees the cognate mind to choose potential results.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This frees the cognate mind to choose potential results.

auth_sentence.content: Broom is cognate with Bramble, so the word must have something to do with spikiness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Broom is cognate with Bramble, so the word must have something to do with spikiness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Broom is cognate with Bramble, so the word must have something to do with spikiness.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同词源的,同类的;同种的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cog同+nat出生的,本土的+e→同生的
in进+nat出生的,本土的+e→与出生一起进来→天赋的
nat出生的,本土的+al……的→adj.出生的
natal[adj.出生的]+ity表名词→n.出生率,出生
nat出生的,本土的+ion表名词→出生之处
nation民族,国家+ality表名词→n.国籍,民族
nat本土的+ive人→n.本地人,本国人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 自然界,大自然;性质,本性,天性
stems_affixes.word_buile: nat出生的,本土的+ure表名词→出生状态→天性
neo新+nat出生的,本土的+e→新出生

means.word_mean: 同宗的,同根的; 同语系的

sentences.en: Physics and astronomy are cognate sciences.
sentences.cn: 物理学与天文学是互有关联的科学。
